resources.string: Initial stage of processing. One of several filtering methods can be chosen, along with the size of the filter kernel.
This is done by convolving image with a normalized box filter. It simply takes the average of all the pixels under kernel area and replace the central element.
This is done by convolving image with a Gaussian filter. The standard deviation of the kernel is 0 in both axes.
In this case, the function takes median of all the pixels under kernel area and central element is replaced with this median value.
Image thresholding - in this stage of processing, a binary mask is created from the input, after applying thresholding on a given range.
The input can be either processed in color or transformed to grayscale.
Specify the radius of pixel values to look for
